summary: Carter-Stark cousins: 140. I swear my house is haunted .  - Its not, its just Sharon and Peter hacking Tonys A.I system and...
question: Carter-Stark cousins: 140. I swear my house is haunted .  - Its not, its just Sharon and Peter hacking Tonys A.I system and pulling dumb pranks on the Avengers.
answer:
Tony didn’t even think that his building could be haunted until he looked up records of the building before it. A woman had died, and there were a lot of weird happenings. 

“I swear my house is haunted,” Tony says. 

“It looks pretty spooky,” Sharon says in a deadpan, stringing up cobwebs between candy jars. Tony rolls his eyes. 

“No, I mean the lights in my room keep flickering, and I keep…well, there’s a story.” Sharon looks at it. 

“Call Buzzfeed Unsolved!” Peter suggests. “The ghost will probably think they’re chill and leave us alone.” 

“Not everything is solved by Ryan and Shane,” Tony says. “No, we can science this.” As he walks away talking to Friday about workable plot points from Ghostbusters, Peter and Sharon share a devilish look. 

“You got the documents to him, right?” Peter asks. 

“Worked like a charm,” Sharon says. “Nice plug for the Buzzfeed channel, by the way.”

Tony at Bucky: He poisoned our water supply, burned our crops, and delivered a plague onto our house!

summary: Secret relationship with Thor/ avengers reaction
question: Secret relationship with Thor/ avengers reaction
answer:
thank you for this request anon! 

-so thor’s like a big sweetheart and you met him when he was on a mission on earth

-and you could proudly say that you were the first person to introduce him to the magical world of Harry Potter 

-anyways, nobody really knew you and thor were a couple because after all, how could you explain who he was and expect anybody to believe you? 

-btw this is pre-iw okay so everybody’s fine and not dust (yet)

-you both bonded over how you both had weird and slightly psychotic siblings 

-thor missed this month’s monthly date he usually had with you so you showed up at the alternate address he wrote down

-and when you got to the address, you were a bit surprised to find that it was at the avenger’s tower

-”huh this is kinda weird”

-when you stepped into the third floor after taking the elevator, you were so happy to see thor but he forgot to mention there were approximately 20 other people there

-tony stark was just completely shook that you and thor were a thing

-captain america was just confused along with bucky

- “wait gods can have significant others???””

- “listen tony if you can get a girlfriend i can get one too”

send requests for headcanons

summary: 33. celebrity/fan au for tony and steve please??? i’ll sell you my soul lmAO
question: 33. celebrity/fan au for tony and steve please??? i’ll sell you my soul lmAO
answer:
Steve was an insanely good artist. He was a wizard with charcoal and watercolor, and frequently used both. 

He was also a huge fan of the tattoo artist Tony Stark, who had come to critical acclaim through his specialty; fantasy and mechanical-inspired tattoos. He had some of the best techniques, and was booked about a year in advance. Steve wasn’t even going to try and get an appointment. His art studio was actually across the street. 

So when he tagged Tony in a portrait of him on Steve’s art instagram account, he wasn’t really expecting anything. It just had the caption “my art studio is actually across from @ stark-inck so I decided to finally do some life study”. He wasn’t really expecting to come back from going grocery shopping to about two thousand new followers, tons of comments, and an amazing amount of likes. 

And then, the comments. “looking good @ steve-art-rogers ;). the likeness is charming, and we’ll definitely have to visit each other soon” 

He feels a bit faint.

summary: All is Fair in Love and War
title: All is Fair in Love and War
body:
read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2yk7xBE

by wunderkerze

Trust is something that can’t easily be earned, but it’s the foundation for any good team. This is the story of how the Avengers one by one realise that the youngest among their ranks is worthy of truly being trusted.

or

Five times Peter earned a teammate’s trust and one time they all returned the favor.

Series: Part 5 of Family Don’t End With Blood

read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2yk7xBE

by wunderkerze

Trust is something that can’t easily be earned, but it’s the foundation for any good team. This is the story of how the Avengers one by one realise that the youngest among their ranks is worthy of truly being trusted.

or

Five times Peter earned a teammate’s trust and one time they all returned the favor.

Bucky’s crusade to bring down HYDRA leads him to hiding out in a safe house in a bustling French city. Little does he know, he’s not the only one here on a self made mission.

summary: Whumptober Day 13: “Stay.”
title: Whumptober Day 13: “Stay.”
body:
Word Count: 854

Warnings: Mentions of blood

Update: So apparently tumblr killed links (Idk why, it honestly makes no sense) But if that’s the case I won’t be linking my masterlists anymore until it’s fixed. If any post has a link in it, it won’t appear in the search engine. Obviously others are saying it too but please if you see a fic/content you like the reblog it! It just became much harder for content creators to spread their work and this would help a lot! You can find my Masterlist on my profile and the Whumptober Masterlist under series!


It was the third time Tony fell down in a matter of minutes. Peter fell with him, hoping to cushion his mentor’s fall. His body ached in protest but he didn’t care, Tony was more important.

He dropped to his knees catching his mentor before he could seriously hurt himself. Peter rolled him over setting him on top of his lap.

“Mr. Stark!” Tony’s eyes were closed his face was pale. “Mr. Stark, you have to stay awake!” Peter shook him gently carefully not to disturb the bloody webbing keeping his mentor’s wound together. He shook the man again growing restless tears threatening to spill.“Tony, please!”

Tony eyes slowly blinked opened his hand reaching out for Peter’s face. “Hey kiddo, what are the tears for.”

Peter sighed in relief. “This is the third time you fell and we’ve barely made it a foot from the last time you fell.” More tears rolled down his face. “Y-You passed out and I-“

“M’fine now,” His mentor’s hushed. “Besides it’s just a gunshot wound I just need a minute.”

“Just a gunshot wound?!” He exclaimed. “Tony you’re bleeding out, we’re not where near where the team told us to meet, our comma are busted, and not to mention there are Hydra agents in these woods.”

“M’fine. Besides I’m the not the only one who’s bleeding.”

Peter looked down at a nasty gash on his leg. It hurt like hell but he wasn’t going to say anything. The last thing he needed was Tony worrying over him.

Tony sat up wincing with every movement as Peter rushed to support him. He added more webbing hoping it would stop the bleeding enough for them to reach the team in time.

“Don’t worry kid, we got this. It’s just one step at a time. Trust me this wound is nothing, especially with my track record,” Tony stumbled a bit clearly in more pain than he’s admitting. “Now let’s meet up with the team.”

Peter nodded walking with his mentor. They didn’t say much, they were both focused on finding the team. With every step, however, Peter could tell Tony wasn’t going to last very long. A sick feeling sat in his gut, that bullet should have been for him.

Bad intel to high tech weapons, the team never stood a chance. Peter’s suit was shredded and Tony’s was in pieces a few miles back. Overwhelmed, he didn’t even see the gun aiming for him, only his mentor’s pushing him out of the way.

The next he knew, Tony was on the ground bleeding and the team was retreating. Hell, Peter didn’t even know if the team actually made it out. But that didn’t matter right now, what did matter was getting Tony out alive.

After getting a pretty good distance away without any major stumbles, Peter began to relax. That was until Tony stopped dead in his tracks before falling to the ground. He quick to grab his mentor before he fell face first into the dirt.

Breathing heavily, Peter tapped Tony’s face trying to wake him up. “Tony?” He didn’t stir, he didn’t move. “Tony, please don’t do this.”

A fresh set of tears rolled down his face as he continued shaking his mentor. Quiet cries escaped from his lips.

“Tony don’t go, do leave me,” He cried. “Stay, stay, please. I-I can’t lose you.”

Tony didn’t respond, he was out cold. Sniffled Peter did the only thing he could do, carry his mentor. He thanked the heavens for his super strength as he hooked his arms around Tony before carrying him bridal style.

“I-I got you, Mr. Stark, I g-got you.”

Peter walked and he walked watching the sun set behind the trees. His leg ached, blood running down his leg. He didn’t care, he needed to get Tony some help. So he ignored the woozy feeling and the black spots filling his vision.

By the time it was almost fully dark, Peter heard some crunching behind him. His heart pounded as he stopped in his tracks stumbling from his own blood loss. He couldn’t put up a fight right now, not with Tony in his arms.

“Kid?” A familiar voice said behind him.

Peter whipped around with tears of joy streaming down his face. “Bucky!” You gotta save-“ He couldn’t finish his sentence before his body gave out from under him.

“Shit,” Bucky said muttering something to a few others running up towards them.

Peter didn’t get to see who they were before his world went black.

____

When Peter woke up, voices spoke over him. The ground rumbled beneath him before he realized he wasn’t in the woods. Shooting up, he was stopped by a slightly panicked Wanda.

“Whoa, whoa!”

“Mr. Stark! Is he-“

“Pete he’s fine,” Natasha cut in. “Bruce is looking after him.”

Peter turned to his right looking at his mentor sleeping peacefully. “O-Oh.”

“Lay down Pete, I’m sure you’re tired,” Natasha said pushing him back down.

Peter stared at his mentor before breathing a sigh of relief. He was ok, Tony was ok, and they were both going to be ok.

@parkrstark | @dissupanatrlbish | @pookiethefrickinbunn | @thepanthatcanwithoutaplan | @a-distressed-fan | @sunny-after-all | @wisehokte | @marvelwallet

A fresh set of tears rolled down his face as he continued shaking his mentor. Quiet cries escaped from his lips.

“Tony don’t go, do leave me,” He cried. “Stay, stay, please. I-I can’t lose you.”

Tony didn’t respond, he was out cold. Sniffled Peter did the only thing he could do, carry his mentor. He thanked the heavens for his super strength as he hooked his arms around Tony before carrying him bridal style.

“I-I got you, Mr. Stark, I g-got you.”

Peter walked and he walked watching the sun set behind the trees. His leg ached, blood running down his leg. He didn’t care, he needed to get Tony some help. So he ignored the woozy feeling and the black spots filling his vision.

By the time it was almost fully dark, Peter heard some crunching behind him. His heart pounded as he stopped in his tracks stumbling from his own blood loss. He couldn’t put up a fight right now, not with Tony in his arms.

“Kid?” A familiar voice said behind him.

Peter whipped around with tears of joy streaming down his face. “Bucky!” You gotta save-“ He couldn’t finish his sentence before his body gave out from under him.

“Shit,” Bucky said muttering something to a few others running up towards them.

Peter didn’t get to see who they were before his world went black.

____

When Peter woke up, voices spoke over him. The ground rumbled beneath him before he realized he wasn’t in the woods. Shooting up, he was stopped by a slightly panicked Wanda.

“Whoa, whoa!”

“Mr. Stark! Is he-“

“Pete he’s fine,” Natasha cut in. “Bruce is looking after him.”

Peter turned to his right looking at his mentor sleeping peacefully. “O-Oh.”

“Lay down Pete, I’m sure you’re tired,” Natasha said pushing him back down.

Peter stared at his mentor before breathing a sigh of relief. He was ok, Tony was ok, and they were both going to be ok.

Kimmy on ao3.

tags: i have some ideas but id like to see if anyone else has anything interesting first :)
summary: Tony looked around the lab in horror, slightly freaked out by the sheer size of everything. It took him about 3 seconds to...
body:
Tony looked around the lab in horror, slightly freaked out by the sheer size of everything. It took him about 3 seconds to connect the dots, and he turned around to face the source of an overly loud chuckle behind him.

“Bruce!”

The yell came out a lot less intimidating in this quiet, high-pitched voice and Tony abruptly stopped, covering his own mouth in horror.

It just made Bruce laugh out loud.

“This isn’t funny! You have to fix me!”

Bruce calmed down, looking apologetic as he sat down to be more at Tony’s eyelevel.

“I’m sorry. I will look into what went wrong asap.”

Three hours later, Bruce had an answer, but it was most certainly not one Tony was looking for. The (tiny) man in question was chilling in a hammock made from one of the cleaning rags and drinking soda from a shot glass, which was still slightly too big, adding to the comical effect.

“Tony–”

His voice blended with another and with wide eyes Bruce realized, in horror, they didn’t lock the others out of the lab. He turned around to look at Clint, who stood in the doorway, staring at the scene with confusion and a growing understanding.

“Oh… Oh!” He burst into laughter, while Tony tried to sink down into the hammock until the sides covered him.

“So what exactly happened here?”

“We tried to make size adjusted Hulk pants. We adjusted the size of something else than the pants.”

A quiet huff came from the bundle Tony was hidden in.

“Lovely. At least you know it works. But I can’t lie, this will probably make the whole being an Avenger business a bit hard. So how do you reverse it?”

Bruce chuckled nervously at that and he could see the suspicion followed by shock on Clint’s face. He was suddenly glad Tony still wasn’t looking at them.

“Yeah, that’s the thing. …you can’t.”

“What?!” A loud enough squeak came out of the fabric cocoon which suddenly started wiggling furiously.

“It’s alright, Tony. You’re not going to stay that way. It will wear off in a few days.”

“Few DAYS?!”

And as Tony finally managed to free himself from the hammock, and ungracefully land on his ass on the table, Clint couldn’t help but laugh.

Oh, this was gonna be great.

——————————————–

@hello-shellhead inspired me to do pocket Tony and since the drawing itself was rather angsty, I needed some fluff.

I would love to do some more of this, so reblog or comment with prompts or ideas for what adventure should Tiny Tony tackle next in his Tiny Week and I will write them!

Who should he meet? What will he encounter? It’s open game.

blog.name: tonystarkismyprompt
blog.title: Tony Stark Fanfic Prompts
blog.description:
Basically a bunch of prompts about Tony Stark/the Avengers. 
(please write me some fics)

tags: tony stark is a good person!
summary: Tony Stark Prompt:
body:
Tony Stark Prompt:

“You made these?”

“Well yeah. Where’d you think they came from, Santa Claus?”

“No I just–they’re amazing Tony.”

“I know I am.”

(Cause Tony doesn’t get enough appreciation for his work and nobody gives him the credit he deserves. This is pretty much just a lame dialogue prompt, but still, take it.)
